name: elements granny square gloves
notes:
**elements granny square gloves** 

**[part of the elements cal][1]** - starts 27th september 2025

the ebook contains all 4 elements granny square accessories patterns.

add a burst of colour to your winter wardrobe with the elements granny square gloves! this cute and cosy design features stylecraft batik elements dk paired with stylecraft bellissima or king cole cherished dk. it’s also a great stash-buster, perfect for using up leftover yarns in your favourite shades. 

✧ skill: intermediate, requires crocheting into the back loops of stitches for the ribbing

✧ hooks: 4, 3.5, 3 mm

✧ yarn: dk weight yarn

✧ us terms: pattern is written in us terms in technical writing

✧ sizes: toddler, child, tween, s, m, l, xl

✧ video tutorial


  [1]: https://www.lullabylodge.com/2025/09/join-elements-granny-square-along.html
